name: Polaris Couple
description:
Platform-puzzle game where you'll control a loving couple that can't touch each other due to some spell thrown by an evil wizard.

You'll go through some levels that you'll pass  using the various abilities of the two characters, such as attraction or repulsion.

This project was entirely developed in 10 weeks for a university assignment.

It is strongly recommended to play this game with a console controller, be it Xbox or Playstation.

The game is in spanish. An english and catalan version are coming soon. Enjoy!
